preqs: Students must have passed one of the following: ECB1101, ECF1100, ECG1101, ECW1101, or ECC1000 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECB1101, ECC1000, ECF1100, ECG1101, ECP1100, ECW1101} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ECC2550, ECC3550, ECF2550, ECF3550, ECW3550, ECX2550}

description: This unit studies recent economic developments of selected Asian countries. Topics include: theories of economic growth; economic freedom and economic development; entrepreneurship and economic transformation in Hong Kong; the role of industrial policy in Japanese post-war economic performance; economic reforms in China and India; and the 1997 Asian financial crisis.
